00015 /*
00016 StackAlloc extracted from GJK-EPA collision solver by Nathanael Presson
00017 Nov.2006
00018 */
00019 
00020 #ifndef B3_STACK_ALLOC
00021 #define B3_STACK_ALLOC
00022 
00023 #include "b3Scalar.h" //for b3Assert
00024 #include "b3AlignedAllocator.h"
00025 
00027 struct b3Block
00028 {
00029         b3Block*                        previous;
00030         unsigned char*          address;
00031 };
00032 
00034 class b3StackAlloc
00035 {
00036 public:
00037 
00038         b3StackAlloc(unsigned int size) { ctor();create(size); }
00039         ~b3StackAlloc()         { destroy(); }
00040         
00041         inline void             create(unsigned int size)
00042         {
00043                 destroy();
00044                 data            =  (unsigned char*) b3AlignedAlloc(size,16);
00045                 totalsize       =       size;
00046         }
00047         inline void             destroy()
00048         {
00049                 b3Assert(usedsize==0);
00050                 //Raise(L"StackAlloc is still in use");
00051 
00052                 if(usedsize==0)
00053                 {
00054                         if(!ischild && data)            
00055                                 b3AlignedFree(data);
00056 
00057                         data                            =       0;
00058                         usedsize                        =       0;
00059                 }
00060                 
00061         }
00062 
00063         int     getAvailableMemory() const
00064         {
00065                 return static_cast<int>(totalsize - usedsize);
00066         }
00067 
00068         unsigned char*                  allocate(unsigned int size)
00069         {
00070                 const unsigned int      nus(usedsize+size);
00071                 if(nus<totalsize)
00072                 {
00073                         usedsize=nus;
00074                         return(data+(usedsize-size));
00075                 }
00076                 b3Assert(0);
00077                 //&& (L"Not enough memory"));
00078                 
00079                 return(0);
00080         }
00081         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Block*                beginBlock()
00082         {
00083                 b3Block*        pb = (b3Block*)allocate(sizeof(b3Block));
00084                 pb->previous    =       current;
00085                 pb->address             =       data+usedsize;
00086                 current                 =       pb;
00087                 return(pb);
00088         }
00089         B3_FORCE_INLINE void            endBlock(b3Block* block)
00090         {
00091                 b3Assert(block==current);
00092                 //Raise(L"Unmatched blocks");
00093                 if(block==current)
00094                 {
00095                         current         =       block->previous;
00096                         usedsize        =       (unsigned int)((block->address-data)-sizeof(b3Block));
00097                 }
00098         }
00099 
00100 private:
00101         void            ctor()
00102         {
00103                 data            =       0;
00104                 totalsize       =       0;
00105                 usedsize        =       0;
00106                 current         =       0;
00107                 ischild         =       false;
00108         }
00109         unsigned char*          data;
00110         unsigned int            totalsize;
00111         unsigned int            usedsize;
00112         b3Block*        current;
00113         bool            ischild;
00114 };
00115 
00116 #endif //B3_STACK_ALLOC
